I ordered a second bag for my daughter after using mine for business and vacation travel for over a year. It fits well under airline seats, even when full. I see this same bag very regularly when traveling (at least 5 on my latest trip). Because of this, I feel that I need to personalize it in some way. I LOVE this backpack!

I’ve ordered several bags in the $100+ range looking for just the right one. They’ve all felt cheap or somehow dysfunctional. On a whim, I ordered the $17 special here, fully expecting to return it. I even waited to return one of the $100 bags until today, so I could only make one trip for both returns. The build quality, materials, and functionality of this bag so far exceed every other bag I’ve ordered. Better than Travelon, Baggalini, PacSafe, LL Bean, and Carhartt! I’m shocked. Also, the sewn on logo is completely black, so it looks more professional than in the pics. Lining is way better quality than in cheap bags. Pockets are smart—placed in just the right spots. I am reminded of when I first ordered TomToc when they were just getting started and were very affordable, but their build was outstanding. Thinking about ordering a backup, just in case this gives out in a few years.

评论概述: Best Value!  Lockable for in-flight or otherwise
评论详情: I checked out 3 different backpacks for carryon purposes when flying overseas.  I have always been wary of leaving my backpack unattended should i needed to step away.  I usually have the backpack on the floor, not in the overhead bin.  This backpack has several compartments that has one zipper but the larger compartments(3) for laptop and others are lockable with a mini-lock.  The material of the zippers were good and doesn't show signs that it could fail in the future.  The canvas is medium strenght which is good compromise between durability and weight. There is no hip belt so don't go hiking with this.This may sound silly but I look at this back pack and feel proud of myself for finding such a good value!of course, everyone has different judgement criterions.

So I bought this for a high schooler and they have been using this for classes and practice, he says he feels it's a solid backpack so far after much use of it and besides it being a little dirty from practice it has held up durable so far like new and hasn't really noticed it till now when I asked them and even had to grab it for a second look and the backpack hold up perfectly, he says he gives it a solid 4.8 out of 5 so he feels happy with it.  we recommend it, good luck to you buyers.
